roleset.name: stubbornly resisting authority/treatment
roleset.note: RECALCITRANT-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8. (from recalcitrant.01-j)

example.name: both args
example.text: Wwdawoqd D. Ythiiar is a 57 year old female with severe rosacea fulminans on face that-1 [*-1] has been recalcitrant to many treatments ; at peak severity , -LRB- 2 years ago -RRB- was getting 6 lesions per day at highest rate ; approximately 15 - 30 new lesions per month ;
